post:
Hej!

It's Ted here from yourserver.se.

We’re happy to announce new datacenter in Riga, Latvia.

The new datacenter is connected with TeliaSonera’s 10Gbps fibers and has great connectivity both to Western Europe (DE-CIX) and Russia (MSK-IX). It’s running new hardware with Xeon E5 CPUs and Intel SSD drives in RAID10, connected with Juniper’s network equipment as in our Swedish datacenter.

Use **coupon code “LATVIANDC30” to get 30% lifetime discount** or **coupon code “LATVIANDC50” to get 50% one month discount**.

I would be happy to answer your questions here.
